list.description: A list of languages available in the application. The name format: en_US.

aclDependencies.description: Rules making language translations available for a user when they don't have access to a scope.

additionalProperties.description: A language path, items are separated by dots.

scope.description: If a user has access to the scope, they will have access to translations defined by a key.

field.description: If a user has access to the field (of a scope), they will have access to translations defined by a key.

anyScopeList.description: If a user has access to any of listed scopes, they will have access to translations defined by a key.
